class.name: SoftRefLoader
class.brief_description: Manages all [SoftRef]s that are asynchronously loading their [Resource]s.

method.name: request_load
method.description: Begins asynchronous load of the provided [SoftRef].

method.name: request_load_from_path
method.description: Returns a [SoftRef] containing a [Resource] located at provided [param path] and immediately starts loading that [Resource] asynchronously.

method.name: request_load_from_uid
method.description: Returns a [SoftRef] containing a [Resource] denoted by provided [param uid] and immediately starts loading that [Resource] asynchronously.
